item.description:
**Ok so I goofed. I used last month's description because I accidentally deleted the email about this months' meeting. Somehow I clicked-through the "delete forever?" message...and instantly regretted it. Heh. Jeanie gave me the scoop. The correct info is below:

The monthly gatherings, held at various Elm City locations from 6-7:30pm, invite drinkers and non-drinkers alike to chat about all things eco-sustainability, corporate social responsibility, biking to work, etc.

Don't Miss this Wednesday's New Haven Green Drinks Event with Justin Pegnataro of Two Coyotes Wilderness School.

Wed. March 19, '08
6pm - 7:30pm *or later if you'd like*
at the Playwright Restaurant
(downtown on Temple St. - just South of Chapel St.)

We'll have our own bar and free buffet, courtesy of the manager, Damien.

Come and hear Justin speak about his wilderness school which offers classes in the New Haven area. I guarantee you'll learn something extremely useful. Justin Pegnataro is Director of Two Coyotes Wilderness School. He leads outdoor educational programs designed to develop a sense of place in their students. Two Coyotes programs integrate nature awareness, wilderness skills, storytelling, and guided exploration to provide unique and transformational experiences for children and adults. See www.twocoyotes.org

Drink a few for St. Patty's Day as well. (Sorry no green dye for the beer is planned).
Be there to find out the latest in what green stuff is happening in New Haven.
See you there!

Debra Lombard and Justin Elicker
New Haven Green Drinks


They also promise to buy you a drink "if you bring your mom" along to the event. To sign up for the New Haven Green Drinks email list, contact co-hosts Justin Elicker and Debra Lombard at newhavengreendrinks@gmail.com.


*From Eric: I have been to two of these happy hours, and after meeting a local business owner, I interviewed for a job at his company. It's a networking AND educational event! Come join the fun! Also, if you missed any of the St Patrick's Day parties, wear some 'green' for this meetup!
see http://www.biothinkin... for details on these international happy hours!
item.name: *Location Update*New Haven Green Drinks Monthly Happy Hour
